title: Can you buff Aatrox?
body:
Aatrox is still a troll champion. 

With old Yorick, you removed the revive because a rioter said that it was encouraging Yorick mains to die. 

This champion encourages you to use ult, and go balls deep in the team fight so you can improve the amount you revive. Such a troll kit!

When you win as aatrox, the enemy team thinks he is a solid champion. When you lose as aatrox, the enemy team thinks you are trolling way too hard.
